responsibilities: Conduct novel research applying AI/ML to OSK’s satellite hyperspectral imagery.
Help transition research to production, deploying models for both batch and online inference as well as embedded on the satellites.
Produce analytical infrastructure for AI/ML pipeline development.
Inform colleagues and mentor Individual Contributors about AI/ML opportunities and tasks.
Publish research in geospatial and/or AI conferences, and write blog posts to showcase work.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on applying AI/ML to satellite hyperspectral imagery, transitioning research to production, and producing analytical infrastructure for AI/ML pipeline development. While these tasks involve AI/ML, they do not specifically mention language models or fine-tuning them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with geospatial data and imagery analysis rather than language model customization.
